successes.title: ATLAS SHRUGGED Movie "Who is John Galt?"
successes.description: Atlas Shrugged tells the compelling story of a country whose economic system is on the brink of collapse. Who is John Galt?

Pledges.description: Thank you. We understand that budgets are tight but backing a project you believe in is important to you. You have our acknowledgment and our gratitude. At this level you will be included in all project updates throughout the production. Well done.
Elect to have us publicly thank you for your contribution from the official Atlas Shrugged Movie Twitter & Facebook accounts.

Elect to have your name appear on the official "Atlas Shrugged 'Who is John Galt?' Kickstarter Producers Wall" at AtlasShruggedMovie.com for life. Having your name appear on wall is entirely optional. Names may be removed at any time.
At this level, you are recognized as having added value to our endeavor and in return we will email you a PDF of the shooting script on the day of the movieâ€™s theatrical release.

When you read Atlas, your mind rendered a visualization of Dagny, in the Gulch, listening to Richard Haley perform his 5th concerto. At this contribution level, you will receive a downloadable soundtrack of "Atlas Shrugged: Who is John Galt?" including all of the themes and music from Part III.

In addition to the soundtrack, screenplay pdf, and Producer's Wall mention, you'll receive an exclusive one-of-a-kind ATLAS SHRUGGED Kickstarter t-shirt with custom artwork. This t-shirt will never be for sale and will only be available to Kickstarter contributors.

Well before the Premiere, be the first to see actual scenes from "Atlas Shrugged: Who is John Galt?" privately screened online with a special introduction from the Producers. Along with this special sneak peak you will also receive all of the rewards found in the lower contribution levels.

In addition to all the items listed for the previous levels, you will receive a Personalized Special Edition DVD of the film after its theatrical release on or about the same time as its available in stores. This limited edition DVD of the movie will boost its own unique artwork specifically designed for Kickstarter contributors and will have your name imprinted on the actual DVD.
